title: How Long Will The 2017 SKT Skins Be Out For
body:
So SKT Skins just released, and you already know I'm about to cop that ekko skin fwm. I get my paycheck next week, so I just wanted to know how long the new SKT 2017 Skins will be out for?

Thanks

replies.body: Those skins are amazing, I especially love the autograph recalls!  Since they are esports skins, they will be on the store for a short time before returning to the vault.  Per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/skt-t1-2016-skins-now-available) page, you'll have until  July 19, 2017, at 23:59 PT.  I hope that helps!
Cool, thanks for replying. I'm gonna swipe the ekko, zac, and jhin skins
